com.akvelon.server.dao.api

Interface Dao<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - type of object ID (primary key).
    V - type of domain object.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CultureDao, IllustrationDao, ProductCategoryDao, ProductDao, ProductDescriptionDao, ProductModelDao, ProductPhotoDao, ProductReviewDao, ProductSubcategoryDao, UnitMeasureDao
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CultureDaoImpl, IllustrationDaoImpl, ProductCategoryDaoImpl, ProductDaoImpl, ProductDescriptionDaoImpl, ProductModelDaoImpl, ProductPhotoDaoImpl, ProductReviewDaoImpl, ProductSubcategoryDaoImpl, SuperDao, SuperStringDao, UnitMeasureDaoImpl

    public interface Dao<K,V>
    Standard CRUD operation with domain objects. The user of this interface can create, read, update, delete domain objects from the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      K create(V value)
      Create domain object in database table.
      void delete(K key)
      Delete domain object of type V from the database.
      java.util.List<V> getAll()
      Reads all objects of type V from the database.
      V read(K key)
      Read domain object of type V from the database.
      <T> java.util.List<V> readAllBy(java.lang.String fieldName, T value)
      Reads all objects of type V from the database, which contains a value of type T in the field "fieldName".
      <T> V readBy(java.lang.String fieldName, T value)
      Read the domain object of type V, which contains a value of type T in the field "fieldName".
      void update(V value)
      Update domain object of type V in database tables.
